1608280.name: Resident Evil Village Original Soundtrack
1608280.description:
Relive the horrors of the village in a spine-tingling auditory form with the Resident Evil Village Original Soundtrack!

25 eerie tracks await you, including the tension-alleviating "save room" music and an ending theme that is sure to leave a lasting impression.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
